thread.title: Pregnant Beyonce flaunts her baby bump after pre-Oscars party with husband Jay Z
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyonce flaunts her baby bump after pre-Oscars party with husband Jay Z

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Pregnant Beyonce flaunts her baby bump after pre-Oscars party with husband Jay Z
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Beyonce put her growing baby bump on show in a figure hugging dress during a night out with Jay Z over the weekend. 
The superstar couple - who are already proud parents to daughter Blue Ivy Carter - revealed earlier this month that they're expecting twins together, and the singer was glowing at a pre-Oscars party recently . 
Bey's bump was clearly on show in a fitted dress, as she carried her coat while leaving the Weistein party at the Montage in Beverly Hills. Beyonce puts her bump on show (Photo: Splash News) 
She was accompanied by her man Jay at the bash, and he looked dapper in a sharp suit. 
Their appearance came days after Beyonce pulled out of her performance at Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival after being told by doctors to reduce her schedule during her pregnancy. Beyonce and Jay Z were seen out and about (Photo: Splash News) 
In a statement posted on the event's Facebook page, it was confirmed that she follow the advice and as such won't be headlining this year - but she will return for 2018. 
"Following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months, Beyonce has made the decision to forgo performing at the 2017 Coachella Valley Music Arts Festival," the message read. 
There was hope she would be able to appear at Coachella after she performed live at the Grammys earlier this month. Like us on Facebook
